dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: Separation Paper Roll; Insulating Paper Coil; Barrier Paper Roll
Separation Paper Roll; Insulating Paper Coil; Barrier Paper Roll
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Separator Paper Coil refers to a spool or roll of barrier paper used for separating layers or parts within a product or during the manufacturing process. It specifies the level of processing the paper has gone through, the technical specifications it adheres to, compliance with industry or international standards, and quality grades. Usage information details how and where the paper is meant to be utilized, while production route indicates the method by which the paper was produced. The educt name describes the raw material or input from which the separator paper was made. The product may be identified as belonging to a production or consumption mix, and its point of transfer is marked, detailing whether it's available to the consumer or at the plant, with each of these aspects described distinctly and separated by commas.

分隔纸卷指的是用于产品内部分层或部件间隔隔离的纸质卷材。其描述包括纸张处理的程度、技术规格、符合的行业或国际标准和质量等级。使用信息描述了纸张的使用方式和预定用途地点。生产路线指出分隔纸是如何制造出来的，而原料名称则描述了制作分隔纸所使用的原始材料或输入物。该产品可能被识别为生产或消费混合体的一部分，且其转移点被明确标记，详细说明该产品是提供给消费者还是在工厂可获得，每个方面都应分别用逗号分隔清楚。
